description: The woman with blonde hair is sitting at her computer, typing and smiling.
text: Woman: I love to create magical worlds and characters for kids.

description: The man with dark hair is sitting on a couch, reading a children's book and laughing.
text: Man: Those sound like fun stories.

description: The man and woman are sitting together on a park bench, the woman reading a storybook to a group of children.
text: Woman: I love sharing my stories with kids.

description: The man and woman are sitting in the woman's living room, brainstorming ideas for a new children's book.
text:
Man: What if the main character was a talking dog?
Woman: I love it!

description: The man and woman are standing in front of a bookstore, their new children's book on display in the window.
text:
Man: We did it! Our book is published!
Woman: I can't wait to see kids reading it.
